messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The bad thing about Sandra Dodd
messages.msgSnippet: AHA!  My first thought on opening the mailbox was Save time by deleting all bad things about me.  (Not really.) In a message dated 5/9/03 9:10:57 AM,
messages.messageBody:
AHA! My first thought on opening the mailbox was "Save time by deleting all
bad things about me." (Not really.)

In a message dated 5/9/03 9:10:57 AM, sorcha-aisling@... writes:

<< Sheesh, all this talk about her good points! I must point out her

major flaw: her children are so much older than mine that she might

not still be around on message boards and mailing lists as my kids

get older, and then I'll be left with her articles and essays instead

of her daily wisdom. >>

There are lots of other great writers here whose kids are little, and you can
help people Sorcha, whose kids are younger than yours, who won't show up
until years from now. Just pass it on!

Sandra

messages.subject: The bad thing about Sandra Dodd
messages.msgSnippet: Sheesh, all this talk about her good points!  I must point out her major flaw:  her children are so much older than mine that she might not still be around on
messages.messageBody:
Sheesh, all this talk about her good points! I must point out her
major flaw: her children are so much older than mine that she might
not still be around on message boards and mailing lists as my kids
get older, and then I'll be left with her articles and essays instead
of her daily wisdom.

Sorcha
